about_the_game:
The Battle Shapers Original Soundtrack, an album crafted by Metric Empire and composed by Emery Monzerol and William Harby, currently boasts twenty tracks, offering more than 50 minutes of adrenaline-pumping rock music designed to have you go in all guns blazing against the wicked Overlords and their robotic hordes!

As the game keeps on growing and grooving during its Early Access phase, we'll be adding in some extra tracks to pump up the soundtrack, and guess what? It'll be on the house for all you early birds who've already bought it! So no need to wait!

As the game keeps on growing and grooving during its Early Access phase, we'll be adding in some extra tracks to pump up the soundtrack, and guess what? It'll be on the house for all you early birds who've already bought it! So no need to wait!
